pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculates the lsmeans and their variances for lm, gls,lme,mer,lmer and glmer models // Calculates the lsmeans and their variances for lm, gls,lme,mer,lmer and glmer models. It also contains a function for mean comparisons and for contrasting linear combination of parameters in the modelMore about what it does (maybe more than one line)
